$interpreted: : A few months later...
Charle: Damnit, so I still failed...
Morris: Turns out you're hiding here?
Charle: How did you find this location?

Morris: All of the Academy's public assets have tracking runes carved into them. You brought so many things with you to this place.
It's gonna take a real idiot to NOT be able to find you.
Charle: Dietrich, is there something you want?

Morris: Well, there's a someone who's been skipping his classes in the Academy. 

The headmaster has asked me to drag that person back and ask him how long does he plan to pull this absenteeism crap.
Morris: How troublesome...
Charle: Please leave. I still have other things to work on.
Morris: Hmph, such flimsy formulas...if you want to achieve the result written up there, you should've done it this way.
Charle: What did you do!?
Morris: Just fixed some of your newbie level mistakes.
Morris: Missing such major and easily spotted errors, this is so unlike you.
Charle: I...
Charle: Just...just what exactly am I still missing!?
Morris: Idiot, calm down. Tell me what the heck you are trying to do first!
Charle: ...I've learned my lesson from Gotthold's sacrifice.
Charle: I've been constantly thinking and researching. I want to create something that can replace humans
Morris: Wait...that's?
Charle: ...Something that can perform dangerous activities in place of humans...
Charle: ...the "Runic Guardian".
Morris: This thing is an artificial lifeform that can be remotely controlled!?
Morris: It...it can move?
Charle: Not yet...not possible using Applied Magic's technology alone.
Charle: ...Therefore, I've also been researching Life Magic these days.
Charle: By combining the two different theories, I want to see if I can get any breakthroughs...
Morris: Are you looking down on me? Life Magic is MY expertise. You never even thought about coming to me for help? How dare you!
Charle: You mean...you're going to help me?
Morris: Just happen to be a little bit interested, surprisingly. If you want me to help, I expect you to ask properly.
Charle: Dietrich...
Morris: If we are to work together, you should stop calling me by my last name. From now on, you call me Morris, I call you Charle.
Morris: Deal? Then a decision is made!
Charle: Yes. Thank you, Morris.
Morris: Hmph. Let's do this, Charle.
: Another few months later...
Charle: Gotthold...
Morris: How is it? All the data is the same as the ones previously calculated, right?
Charle: All identical. No deviations at all.
Morris: Good. Then it's time for the first operation test!
Charle: S-Success.
Charle: Morris, we did it!
Morris: You're speaking the obvious. This Runic Guardian was created through our joint efforts.
Morris: On top of that, you have a genius like me working on it~
Charle: Quick, let's see it move around.
Morris: Man, you're so noisy sometimes.
Morris: You just be quiet and observe it in action!
Morris: Haha, this is pretty easy to get the hang of, isn't it?
Morris: Very well, let's try dashing forward~
Charle: Morris, monsters ahead!
Morris: Hmph, just a few puny monsters.
Morris: The Runic Guardian will take care of them in no time~
Charle: You said the exact same thing back then during the war for Crystals...
Morris: ...Charle, just you watch.
Morris: Runic Guardian, terminate those monsters!
Morris: Controls are lost. How is that possible!?
Morris: Damnit, it got controlled by the monsters!
Charle: Look out!
Charle: At least it's able to move. Maybe we can try again once we get back...
Morris: What good is a guardian if it can be controlled by monsters! It's worthless!
Charle: You're right. It's utterly useless...what am I doing... I knew this was impossible all along...
Charle: I'm just trying to escape Gotthold's death...
Charle: I couldn't even protect my own student.
Charle: I don't deserve to even call myself a teacher!
Morris: You dumb s***!
Morris: I have no idea why a genius like me is doing working together with such a negative and self-loathing idiot!
Charle: What is that about! Aren't you the one who butted in here?
Morris: Yeah, that's right. I'm a nosy, meddlesome guy!
Charle: Sorry...
Morris: Louder. I can't hear you.
Charle: I am sorry, Morris. I got overwhelmed by emotion and lost myself back there.
Charle: Are you willing...to throw caution to the wind with me once more?
Morris: Hmph, alright then. Even I can't deny the fact that this partnership with you has been rather interesting and enjoyable, surprisingly.
Morris: Besides, without me...
Morris: ...you can't achieve anything, can you?
Charle: Morris, let's try again. This time, we'll absolutely turn this world upside down!
Morris: Ho?
Morris: Hmph, I get a feeling that we're gonna make something incredible.
Charle: We definitely can!
Morris: Idiot~ You have me here, that's guaranteed!
Charle: *...chuckles*...~
Morris: Hahaha~

Model.Text: A few months later...
Damnit, so I still failed...
Turns out you're hiding here?
How did you find this location?

All of the Academy's public assets have tracking runes carved into them. You brought so many things with you to this place.
It's gonna take a real idiot to NOT be able to find you.
Dietrich, is there something you want?

Well, there's a someone who's been skipping his classes in the Academy. 

The headmaster has asked me to drag that person back and ask him how long does he plan to pull this absenteeism crap.
How troublesome...
Please leave. I still have other things to work on.
Hmph, such flimsy formulas...if you want to achieve the result written up there, you should've done it this way.
What did you do!?
Just fixed some of your newbie level mistakes.
Missing such major and easily spotted errors, this is so unlike you.
Just...just what exactly am I still missing!?
Idiot, calm down. Tell me what the heck you are trying to do first!
...I've learned my lesson from Gotthold's sacrifice.
I've been constantly thinking and researching. I want to create something that can replace humans
Wait...that's?
...Something that can perform dangerous activities in place of humans...
...the "Runic Guardian".
This thing is an artificial lifeform that can be remotely controlled!?
It...it can move?
Not yet...not possible using Applied Magic's technology alone.
...Therefore, I've also been researching Life Magic these days.
By combining the two different theories, I want to see if I can get any breakthroughs...
Are you looking down on me? Life Magic is MY expertise. You never even thought about coming to me for help? How dare you!
You mean...you're going to help me?
Just happen to be a little bit interested, surprisingly. If you want me to help, I expect you to ask properly.
Dietrich...
If we are to work together, you should stop calling me by my last name. From now on, you call me Morris, I call you Charle.
Deal? Then a decision is made!
Yes. Thank you, Morris.
Hmph. Let's do this, Charle.
Another few months later...
Gotthold...
How is it? All the data is the same as the ones previously calculated, right?
All identical. No deviations at all.
Good. Then it's time for the first operation test!
S-Success.
Morris, we did it!
You're speaking the obvious. This Runic Guardian was created through our joint efforts.

Quick, let's see it move around.

Sorry...
Louder. I can't hear you.
I am sorry, Morris. I got overwhelmed by emotion and lost myself back there.
Are you willing...to throw caution to the wind with me once more?
Hmph, alright then. Even I can't deny the fact that this partnership with you has been rather interesting and enjoyable, surprisingly.
Besides, without me...
...you can't achieve anything, can you?
Morris, let's try again. This time, we'll absolutely turn this world upside down!
Ho?
Hmph, I get a feeling that we're gonna make something incredible.
We definitely can!
Idiot~ You have me here, that's guaranteed!
*...chuckles*...~

I knew this was impossible all along...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_11_003","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm just trying to escape Gotthold's death...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_11_004","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I couldn't even protect my own student.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_11_005","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't deserve to even call myself a teacher!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_11_006","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You dumb s***!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_12_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I have no idea why a genius like me is doing working together with such a negative and self-loathing idiot!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_12_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What is that about! Aren't you the one who butted in here?","sfxName":"h0025_story_019","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_12_002","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yeah, that's right. I'm a nosy, meddlesome guy!","sfxName":"h0043_story_004","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_12_003","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sorry...","sfxName":"h0025_story_026","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_12_004","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Louder. I can't hear you.","sfxName":"h0043_story_023","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_13_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I am sorry, Morris. I got overwhelmed by emotion and lost myself back there.","sfxName":"h0025_story_018 (0.3)","sfxVolume":0.3},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_13_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Are you willing...to throw caution to the wind with me once more?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph, alright then. Even I can't deny the fact that this partnership with you has been rather interesting and enjoyable, surprisingly.","sfxName":"h0043_story_002","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Besides, without me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...you can't achieve anything, can you?","sfxName":"h0043_story_009","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Morris, let's try again. This time, we'll absolutely turn this world upside down!","sfxName":"h0025_story_014","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_001","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ho?","sfxName":"h0043_story_024","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_002","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph, I get a feeling that we're gonna make something incredible.","sfxName":"h0043_story_004","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_003","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We definitely can!","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_004","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Idiot~ You have me here, that's guaranteed!","sfxName":"h0043_story_001","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_005","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"*...chuckles*...~","sfxName":"h0025_story_013","sfxVolume":0.6},{"ID":"char_h0025_003_dialog_english##_16_006","SpeakerName":"Morris","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0043","IconName":"h0043s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hahaha~","sfxName":"h0043_story_006","sfxVolume":0.5}]}
